name: Fiat Lux (Ruizhe Tang)
description:
Fiat Lux is a multiplayer hide-and-seek game. The host plays as a seeker. His goal is find and kill other players by looking at them. The client plays as hider and his goal is hide and bring a cube to the matched cylinder.

Seeker: RMB to rotate. LMB to switch to other avatar. Middle wheel to move your camera.

Hider: WASD to move. E to pick up item. Space to save another hider when close to him. LMB to throw item.
